member.name: T:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.WmfExporter
member.summary: Creates WMF (Windows MetaFile) images from MindFusion.Diagramming diagrams.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.WmfExporter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the WmfExporter class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.WmfExporter.Export(MindFusion.Diagramming.Diagram,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a WMF file representing the specified diagram.
member.param: A reference to the diagram that will be exported.
The full path to the WMF file.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.WmfExporter.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a description string associated with the metafile.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.WmfExporter.RenderOptions
member.summary: Gets a RenderOptions instance that provides various settings for configuring the appearance of exported diagrams.
